name: Miciosegone Grand Prix
description:
This racing game has a very simple system, with four directions movement and boost items in some points of the circuit. The player can only go through the story mode, where he can proceed cup by cup in order to win all the trophies and the boss keys. New worlds are unlocked as the player wins the cups and defeats boss enemies.

The best racer of the galaxy, Hardley Race, kidnaps some random people from three random universes. He caught characters from the worlds of Dovadula's Burn, T-rex, Muscle SAM and Space Hunter and forces them to compete in a series of cups for his entertainment. Only the best racer can win all the cups and challenge Hardley Race for the title of best racer of the galaxy and the safety of all the universes.
